_header: Ye wring my hand so sore
Subjects: women, as speakers/narrators; women, erring; erotic verse; songs; men, treachery of
_description: An amorous encounter — six 8-line stanzas and burden: ‘Bewar my lytyl fynger / syr I yow desyre / bewar my lytyl fynger / bewar my lytyl fynger / bewar my lytyl fynger / syr I yow desyre / bewar my lytyl fynger / syr I yow desyre’
